snippet: John and Linda Parsons found themselves disappointed after their initial attraction to a Christian-themed cohousing development in Washington State.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column describes the experience of John and Linda Parsons, who moved to a Christian-themed co-housing development in Washington State, only to find it disappointing in its spiritual restrictions.
lead_paragraph: John and Linda Parsons found themselves disappointed after their initial attraction to a Christian-themed cohousing development in Washington State.

headline.print_headline: Soul-Searching in a Christian Community Over Views on How to Live
headline.seo: When Visions of a Christian Community Collide
headline.main: Soul-Searching in a Christian Community Over Views on How to Live
